abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the Small
            Farmer Development Project is to: 1) increased productive
            and organizational capacity in participating poor, rural
            communities, 2) greater emphasis on rural poverty issues in
            the sectoral agenda and improved coordination of rural
            development programs and policies, and 3) financial
            assistance provided to poor, rural producers in areas
            declared in flood emergency or disaster. The reallocation is
            necessary to: a) allocate funds that are currently
            unallocated; b) adjust expenditures categories to actual
            projected disbursements; and c) allow financing of
            technically approved subprojects ready for completion before
            the closing date. The reallocation does not imply any
            significant change in project objectives, results and activities.
